document.masterDocTitle: New South African Flat Rock Scorpions (Liochelidae: Hadogenes)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New South African Flat Rock Scorpions (Liochelidae: Hadogenes)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hadogenes bicolor Purcell, 1899
: Hewitt, 1918: 160 , 161 (part), pl. 30, figs. 88, 89; Newlands, 1980 (unpublished): 99–105 (part), fig. 48 (part); Newlands and Cantrell, 1985: 40 , 42, 44 (part).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Hadogenes longimanus Prendini, 2001a: 156– 159
, figs. 1 , 11–21 , 34, 37 , table 2;
Prendini, 2001b: 137
.
